sentences.en: A man pointed a gun at them and pulled the trigger.
sentences.cn: 一名男子拿枪指着他们，接着扣动了扳机。

sentences.en: An arrow pointed to the toilets.
Benedict pointed downwards again with his stick.
sentences.cn: 贝内迪克特用他的拐棍又往下指了指。

sentences.en: Coincident interests with the corporate rich and political directorate are pointed out.
sentences.cn: 有人指出这合乎的是公司富豪和政治官员的利益。

sentences.en: David Khan pointed his finger at Mary.
sentences.cn: 戴维·卡恩用手指指着玛丽。

sentences.en: He pointed a stubby finger at a wooden chair opposite him.
sentences.cn: 他伸出一根粗短的手指指向他对面的一把木椅。

sentences.en: He pointed at me with the stem of his pipe.
He pointed at the empty bottle and the waitress quickly replaced it.
sentences.cn: 他指了指空瓶子，女服务员立即重新拿了一瓶。

sentences.en: He pointed to a chair, signalling for her to sit.
sentences.cn: 他指着一把椅子，示意她坐下。

sentences.en: I nudged Stan and pointed again.
sentences.cn: 我轻轻推了推斯坦，又指了一下。

sentences.en: Private polls and embassy reports pointed to a no vote.
sentences.cn: 私人民意调查和使馆报告表明投票结果将会是否决。

sentences.en: She pointed out the salient features of the new design.
sentences.cn: 她指出新设计的几个显著特征。

sentences.en: She pointed the gun at him and—bam!
sentences.cn: 她把枪对着他，然后就是乓的一声。
